author: jtmarlinintern
body:
I am sure others have mentioned these already, no particular order

&#x200B;

You too can be a Stock market Genius - Joel Greenblatt

Common Stocks, Uncommon Profits - Phil Fischer

Midas Touch - John Train

Zebra in Lion Country- Ralph Wanger

One Up on Wall Street- Peter Lynch

Not a Value Book, but the Market Wizards and Also New Market Wizards are good reads about successful Traders and Managers i found enjoyable
